Adrenaline.effect: Use at the start of a round. During this round, apply +5 Health to each of your WOOKIES.

Advance Warning.effect: Use during your activation. You and an adjacent friendly figure each gain 1 movement point.

Against the Odds.effect: Use at the end of a round. If your opponent has at least 8 more VPs than you, choose up to 3 of your figures. Those figures become Focused.

All in a Day's Work.effect: Use after you resolve a Special or Interact during your activation to become Focused and perform 1 additional action.

Ambush.effect: Use when an attack targeting you is declared. If you share an edge or corner with a space containing blocking, impassable, or difficult terrain, interrupt to move 4 spaces to a space adjacent to the attacker, then the attacker suffers 2 damage.

Apex Predator.effect: Use during your activation to become focused, Hidden, gain 2 Power Tokens of your choice, and 2 movement points. The next time a hostile figure within 2 spaces is defeated during this activation, recover 2 damage.

Arcing Shot.effect: Use before you declare an attack. You may target a figure or object adjacent to an empty space in your line of sight.

Armed Escort.effect: Use during your activation. During this round, other friendly figures within 2 spaces of you gain +1 Evade.

Assassinate.effect: Use while attacking a figure. If this is the first Command card you play during this attack, apply +3 damage to the attack results. You cannot play Command cards during this attack.

Balancing Force.effect: Use at the start of a round if your affiliation is Rebel. Each player chooses up to 3 figures. Roll 1 red die. Each of those figures recovers damage equal to the damage results on the die.

Ballistics Matrix.effect:
Use during your activation. Place this card on your Deployment card as an Attachment.
----------------
Attachment: Exhaust this card before you declare an attack. Figures do not block line of sight during this attack.

Battle Scars.effect: Use during your activation to get 1 Power Token of your choice. If you have suffered 3 or more damage, gain 2 Power Tokens of your choice instead.

Battlefield Awareness.effect: Use after another friendly figure within 3 spaces rolls any number of dice to reroll 1 of those dice.

Beatdown.effect: Use during your activation. During your group's activation, apply +1 damage to the attack results of the next 2 attacks performed by friendly figures.

Behind Enemy Lines.effect: Use during your activation while in your opponents deployment zone to look at the top 3 cards of their Command deck and return those cards in any order.

Black Market Prices.effect: Special Action: Draw 2 Command cards. Then discard 1 card from your hand. You gain VPs equal to the cost of the discarded card.

Bladestorm.effect: Use while attacking to apply +1 Surge to the attack results. After the attack resolves, each hostile figure within 2 spaces of you suffers 1 damage.

Blaze of Glory.effect: Use after an activation resolves to ready your Deployment card. At the end of this round, you suffer 3 Damage.

Blend In.effect:
Place this card on your Deployment card at the start of a round. It is now an Attachment.

Attachment: You cannot be the target of an attack. Discard this card at the end of your activation or when you declare an attack.

Blitz.effect: Use while attacking to apply +1 Surge to the attack results.

Blood Feud.effect: Place this card on a hostile Deployment card. When an attack targeting a figure in that group is declared, apply +1 Damage to the attack results.

Bodyguard.effect: Use when an attack targeting an adjacent friendly figure is declared. If you could be the target of the attack, the attack targets you instead.

Brace for Impact.effect: Use while defending to add 1 black die to your defense pool.

Brace Yourself.effect: Use when an attack targeting you is declared. if it is not the attackers activation, apply +2 Block to the defense results.

Built on Hope.effect:
Use during your activation to look at the top 3 cards of your Command deck. Place 1 of them into your hand and the others on the top of bottom of your Command deck in any order.

Passive: When this card is discarded from your Command deck, re-draw it.

Burst Fire.effect: Special Action: Perform an attack. If the target suffers 1 or more Damage, each figure adjacent to the target space is Stunned.

Cal's Buddy.effect: Use during your activation to deploy the BD-1 Companion figure to your space or an adjacent space. For the rest of the mission, it activates at the start or end of your activation.

Call the Vanguard.effect: Use at the start of a round. A friendly TROOPER with a figure cost of 4 or greater may interrupt to perform a move and an attack.

Camouflage.effect: Use when an attack targeting you is declared. You become Hidden.

Capitalize.effect:
Use while attacking to choose 1 die. The player that rolled that die must reroll that die.

Passive (Discard Pile): When a hostile figure with a HARMFUL condition gains another HARMFUL condition, you may re-draw this card.

Capture the Weary.effect: Special Action: Choose an adjacent hostile figure. That figure becomes Weakened. If that figure was already Weakened, it suffers 2 Strain instead.

Cavalry Charge.effect: Use at the start of a round. During this round, you gain +1 Block, and while a friendly TROOPER within 3 spaces is attacking, apply +1 Hit to the attack results.

Celebration.effect: Use after a unique hostile figure is defeated to gain 4 VPs.

Change of Plans.effect: Use after you resolve a group's activation. Exhaust 1 of your Deployment cards to ready 1 other Deployment card of equal or lower Deployment cost that shares at least 1 trait.

Chaotic Force.effect: Use at the start of a round if your affiliation is SCUM. Each player chooses up to 3 figures. Roll 1 green die. Each of those figures suffers Strain equal to the Accuracy result.

Cheat to Win.effect: Use when you use "Gambit", after rolling the new die. You may change that die's result to another result of your choice on that die.

Choose a Side.effect:
Use during your activation. During this round, other friendly Mobile figures gain the following abilities based on your army affiliation: 
SCUM: "Personal Combat Shield"
IMPERIAL: "Gar Saxon's Flamethrower"

Cloned Reinforcements.effect: Special Action: Choose a defeated friendly non-DROID, non-unique TROOPER with a figure cost of 4 or less and place it in an empty adjacent space.

Close and Personal.effect:
Use during your activation to move up to 2 spaces. Then perform a melee attack without using an action using 1 red and 1 yellow die. The attack uses only the following abilities:
- Pierce 1
- Surge: +1 Hit
- Surge: Stun

Close the Gap.effect: Use at the start of a round. Each friendly BRAWLER may move up to 2 spaces. Then each friendly BRAWLER within 4 spaces of a hostile figure gains 1 Armor Token.

Collateral Damage.effect: Use after you resolve an attack. Choose a figure or object other than the defender within 2 spaces of the target space. That figure or object suffers 2 Damage.

Collect Intel.effect: Use at the start of a round if you have 1 or more SPIES on the map. Look at your opponent's hand of Command cards.

Combat Resupply.effect: Use during your activation. Distribute Hit tokens equal to the current round number to friendly figures within 3 spaces.

Comm Disruption.effect: Use when a Command card with a cost of X is played, where X is equal to or less than the number of friendly SPY groups on the map. Discard that card and cancel is effects.
